"Changing the Vital Gauge Design":
"The box in the bottom-left corner of your screen containing your character name, Class level, HP bar, PP bar and so on is called your Vital Gauge. You are able to change its background design.

Use to open the Main Menu, then select Personal, then Vital Gauge Design."

"You can unlock additional Vital Gauge designs by using special ticket items.

The Vital Gauge design you select will also be reflected on other Party Members' screens.
"
